Referenced by brics_3d::PCLTypecaster::convertToBRICS3DDataType().

void brics_3d::ColorSpaceConvertor::rgbToHsv ( int  red,
int  green,
int  blue,
double *  hue,
double *  sat,
double *  val 
)

R, G and B are scaled to fit 0..1 range.

V <- max(R,G,B) S <- (V-min(R,G,B))/V if V≠0, 0 otherwise

(G - B)*60/S, if V=R H <- 180+(B - R)*60/S, if V=G 240+(R - G)*60/S, if V=B

if H<0 then H<-H+360

Parameters:
rred-value
ggreen-value
bblue-value
hcorresponding hue
scorresponding saturation
vcorresponding intensity value
